title: Why Trump Is Firing Sessions Now

text:
Why Trump Is Firing Sessions Now We look at the story behind the decision and the implications for the Russia investigation.
Hosted by Michael Barbaro, produced by Theo Balcomb and Annie Brown, and edited by Larissa Anderson
